page.title: 14SHEERNESS - "THE WRECK"
page.content: THE AMERICAN LIBERTY SHIP,THE {RICHARD MONTGOMERY}BROKE HER BACK ON THE NORE SANDS OFF SHEERNESS IN AUGUST 1944.SHE WAS CARRYING AMMUNITION TO LONDON VIA THE THAMES ESTUARY WHEN A FIERCE STORM CAUSED HER TO SWAY AND EVENTUALLY SINK. WITH{8000 TONS OF BOMBS AND TNT IN HER HOLDS THE "WRECK" WOULD CAUSE HAVOC TO SHIPPING LANES OFF SHEERNESS IF IT EXPLODED. BOUYS WARN SHIPS TO KEEP AWAY BUT WITH SHEERNESS TOWN SO CLOSE A COLLISION WOULD CAUSE EXTENSIVE DAMAGE TO THE DOCKS AND THE TOWN ITSELF. SOME EXPERTS SAY THE WRECK SHOULD BE LEFT ALONE WHILE OTHERS THINK THE EXPLOSIVES SHOULD BE REMOVED.THE SUPERSTRUCTURE CAN BE SEEN STICKING OUT OF THE WATER - A CONSTANT REMINDER OF THE DANGER BELOW.
